name: Mercury
desc: Mercury is the smallest planet in the Solar System and the closest to the Sun.

name: Venus
desc: Venus is the second planet from the Sun. It is sometimes called Earth's 'sister'.

name: Earth
desc: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only place known in the universe with life.

name: Mars
desc: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System.

name: Jupiter
desc: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System.

name: Saturn
desc: Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and the second-largest in the Solar System, after Jupiter.

name: Uranus
desc: Uranus is the seventh planet from the Sun, and has the third-largest diameter in our solar system.

name: Neptune
desc: Neptune is the eighth planet from the Sun and the farthest known planet in the Solar System.
